content:
I get an error like this in my IG

ERROR: ImplementationGuide.definition.parameter[22].value: Supressed messages file is not using the new format (see https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Implementation+Guide+Parameters)

I have looked at the recommended confluence page but that doesnt help because I cannot identify where
ImplementationGuide.definition.parameter[22].value:
is.
Is this a bogus error?
No. It means that your suppressed messages file doesn't have the proper header. Not sure why it's listing parameter[22]. Maybe that's your first line in your suppressed messages file?

Lloyd McKenzie said:

No. It means that your suppressed messages file doesn't have the proper header. Not sure why it's listing parameter[22]. Maybe that's your first line in your suppressed messages file?

Well I think I found the problem. I did not create a suppressed messages file at all. I do see an ignore warnings file which I guess was generated. I did not create it. Its full of stuff that makes little sense, but I have an example of a good one.

I've added the suppress warnings file (in the new format) to the AU FHIR Base IG and there are some warnings that just don't suppress - yet other similar ones do...
ValueSet https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/ValueSet/australian-states-territories-2 not found by validator
It lists it at the bottom in the suppressed area too...
http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/qa.html
@Grahame Grieve as discussed briefly - its in the current master branch

I'm getting this same error. I've tried using the old format and the new format, at least as far as I can tell. The example on the confluence page is limited. Does anyone have a more extensive example I could see/imitate?
@Grahame Grieve this is still a bug - have a look at eg. https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core/branches/1.1.0/qa.html#internal
wait ... no ... that bug is on me
